page.title: 02A Summer Weekend in 1985.
page.content: Holidays are great.Last Saturday I went to my Nanna's to sleep.I went in the car.Actually I sleep at Auntie Maxine's and my brother Wayne sleeps at Nanna's.Auntie Maxine has a little girl called Nicola who is a year old. We play with my Sindy and Barbie dolls.I have some new clothes to put on the dolls.There was a dress and a skirt top with a purple blouse.When we had finished we had tea with Gran. Next morning when I got up I watched a Tom and Jerry cartoon on the T.V. then I ate a Mars Bar and watched the Kenny Everet Show.Little Nicola started to cry so cousin Andy took her out of her cot.She cheered up when she found me in the spare bedroom with all of her toys.We all had scrambled eggs for our breakfast.Its nice staying at Auntie Maxine's. by Michelle Bailey aged 10.
